title: didnt get points in ranked game this afternoon
body: Won a ranked game this afternoon around 3pm eastern. At first,the  end game lobby didnt load. The match didnt show up in my match history either. A few hours later, the game and stats showed up in my match history, but still no ranked points(lp?). Not sure how the game shows up perfectly now in match history but my lp hasnt adjusted.

replies.body: The server was experiencing issues today, so it may have been due to that - unfortunately. {{sticker:sg-soraka}}

That match likely happened while the servers were having some minor issues if the LP never showed up at all. Reach out to our tech agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see if there's any way they can get that straightened out!
